description: ICD-10 code mapping to 4 target conditions for multi-label classification

chd.name: Congenital Heart Disease
chd.description: Any congenital heart defect (VSD, ASD, ToF, PDA, etc.)

myocarditis.name: Myocarditis
myocarditis.description: Inflammation of heart muscle (acute, viral, fulminant)

kawasaki.name: Kawasaki Disease
kawasaki.description: Mucocutaneous lymph node syndrome with cardiac involvement

cardiomyopathy.name: Cardiomyopathy
cardiomyopathy.description: Primary heart muscle disease (dilated, hypertrophic, restrictive)

notes.multi_label: Samples can have multiple conditions (e.g., CHD + myocarditis)
notes.normal_inference: Normal = all condition labels are 0 (no explicit normal class)
notes.excluded_codes: Non-cardiac ICD-10 codes (J, K, R, etc.) are ignored
